mapper.select:
select
from ORDADM.ORDERS where ORDER_CLASS ='E' and ORDER_CODE = 'Z0052' and ENTER_DATE_TIME >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND ENTER_DATE_TIME < TRUNC(SYSDATE)+1

update ORDADM.ORDERS
REPEAT_INDICATOR = #{repeatIndicator,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ORDER_CLASS = #{orderClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TEXT = #{orderText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CODE = #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

DOSAGE_UNITS = #{dosageUnits,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PERFORM_RESULT = #{performResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

DRUG_BILLING_ATTR = #{drugBillingAttr,jdbcType=NUMERIC},

STOP_ORDER_DATE_TIME = #{stopOrderDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ISPRINT = #{isprint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PATIENT_ID = #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and VISIT_ID = #{visitId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and ORDER_SUB_NO = #{orderSubNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
